 Eftersom du kommer att samarbeta med både ditt eget och andra utvecklingsteam inom SPP Tech är det viktigt att du är kommunikativ både på svenska och engelska. Du trivs med att dela kunskap, lösa problem tillsammans och bidra till en öppen och prestigelös teamkultur.
   

  

**Utöver detta ser vi gärna att du har:**
 ✔ Ca 5-7 års erfarenhet av systemutveckling
   

  

 ✔ Erfarenhet av att arbeta med tekniker främst inom Microsoft
   

  

 ✔ God kunskap inom backend
   

  

**Vår teknikstack är primärt:**
* C#/.NET
* React.js/Typescript
* Microsoft Azure
* GitHub, Github Actions


**Ansökan**
 Skicka in din ansökan genom länken
 **här** 
**.** 
 I den här rekryteringen samarbetar vi med Ants, så sök tjänsten via deras jobbportal.
   

  

 Har du frågor om tjänsten? Kontakta gärna rekryteringsansvarig Sofia Odeen på sofia.odeen@ants.se. Urval och intervjuer sker löpande – så vänta inte med din ansökan!
   

  

**Om oss**
 Vi är en del av norska Storebrand, tillsammans är vi en av Nordens ledande koncerner för sparande och försäkringslösningar. Vi utmärker oss bland annat genom vårt fokus på hållbarhet och ansvarsfulla investeringar.
   

  

 SPP värdesätter de kvaliteter som jämn könsfördelning och mångfald tillför verksamheten. Vi ser därför gärna sökande av alla kön och med olika födelsebakgrund och livserfarenhet.
   

  

*Med kandidatens samtycke görs en bakgrundskontroll under anställningsprocessens slutskede som innebär kontroll av personalia, ekonomiska förhållanden och juridiska frågor. Även CV och annan ansökningsdokumentation kan komma att verifieras.*

title: Integrationskonsult
job_function: Business Development, Consulting, and Information Technology
description:
*Vill du vara en nyckelspelare i våra kunders framgång genom att sammankoppla system och processer i både on-prem- och cloudlösningar? Då har du kommit rätt! Detta är ett ständigt växande och spännande område! Vi som arbetar med integration på Zington skapar värde genom att förstå arkitektur, processer, systemförmågor och hur man på bästa sätt kan få ut och använda data ur respektive lösning.* 




  





**Om rollen** 




 Som konsult inom Integration hos Zington blir du en nyckelspelare i att hjälpa våra kunder att skapa ytterligare värde i sin affär. Ditt uppdrag är att omsätta affärsbehov till moderna och effektiva integrationslösningar, oftast baserat på Microsofts molnplattform Azure eller inom SAP. Med djup förståelse för kundens affär och processer hjälper du kunden bygga mer effektiva lösningar och att skapa värden som de tidigare inte sett.
 



  





 Inom detta område ser vi behov av både arkitekter och utvecklare framåt. Vi tror på värdet av att vara en del i någonting större, en gemenskap, och att det får oss alla att både kunna leverera starkare i uppdraget och helt enkelt bli ännu bättre, ännu snabbare än om vi arbetar ens
 



 kilt.I denna roll kombineras teknisk skicklighet med strategisk insikt, helst arbetandes sida vid sida med dina kollegor på Zington. Vill du ta din karriär till nästa nivå? Välkommen att ansöka!
 



  





**Dina kompetenser och egenskaper** 



* Utbildning som ingenjör, data- eller systemvetare, eller arbetslivserfarenheter som demonstrerar en stark förmåga att sätta sig in i och lösa problem.
* Tidigare erfarenhet av Microsofts eller SAPs produkter tjänster inom Integration, gärna inom moln och gärna i rollen som konsult
* +4 års erfarenhet
* Förstår vikten av göra det lilla extra när det behövs men kan samtidigt ge sig själv (och andra) en paus när det behövs.
* Trivs i att verka i en föränderlig miljö och inser att flexibilitet är en superkraft.
* Vågar ta hjälp och även hjälpa andra.
* Nyfiken.



  





**Mer om rollen** 




 Vi rekryterar löpande och ser gärna att du kan börja så snart som möjligt men månar om att hitta rätt person. Därför värderar vi dina personliga egenskaper och att vi trivs ihop högt.
 



  





 Har du frågor eller funderingar? Kontakta rekryterande chef Andreas Åkerblad på andreas.akerblad@zingtongroup.com
 



  





**Om Zington** 




 Zington är ett konsultföretag med expertis inom Management, IT och Design. Vår resa började redan 2008 men idag är vi 250 medarbetare i Stockholm och fler än 4000 kollegor globalt inom VASS koncernen. Vi stöttar kunder som ex. Atrium Ljungberg, Axfood, Apollo och Fora i digital transformation genom att skapa tjänster, bygga lösningar och utforma strategier som driver affären framåt. På Zington ligger vår styrka i våra medarbetare. Oavsett om du är en specialist eller generalist kan vi som konsultföretag erbjuda dig en plats att växa och trivas på. Vi strävar efter att vara en plats där vi stöttar varandra, delar med oss av vår kunskap och utvecklas tillsammans. Vår framgång bygger på engagerade människor – när du växer, växer företag.

title: Shopify Page Builder (Freelancer)
description:
**Beyond Alpha** is a fast-growing natural food tech business selling across the United States, Australia and Europe. We specialize in formulating, producing and marketing gut, digestive and microbiome health foods and natural supplements, designed to help our clients make long-lasting positive health changes and start living very full lives again.

  

We’re on the lookout for a **Freelance Page Builder (Part-Time)** to join our team on a project basis—with the potential for ongoing collaboration. Your **first project** will be to build a high-converting, visually engaging **Product Page using GemPages** for **Beyond Alpha**. This page should reflect the brand’s unique identity while also being optimized for performance and user experience.

  

If we’re happy with the results and working together feels like a great fit, we’d love to continue working with you on a **part-time freelance basis**, helping us create similar product and landing pages. This is a great opportunity for someone who enjoys combining creative flair with conversion-focused design and is comfortable working in a flexible, remote setting.

 **Why You'll Love Working at Beyond Alpha:**

* **Competitive Salary** – Your skills and expertise deserve to be rewarded.
* **Work from Anywhere** – Your home, a cozy café, or a beachside co-working space—it’s your call!
* **Join a Supportive, Global Team** – Work with passionate professionals from around the world.
* **Flexible Working Hours** – Manage your schedule in a way that works best for you.
* **Exciting & Dynamic Work Environment** – Every day brings new challenges and opportunities.
* **Make a Real Impact** – Help create products that improve people’s lives.

 **Before you dive deeper, please note the following key points:**


This is a freelance fully remote part-time role


We are seeking someone preferably with a background in B2C marketing


Although the role is remote, the candidate must be available during EU hours (GMT)

**Key Responsibilities:**

* Design and build a visually appealing, high-converting product page for Beyond Alpha using GemPages.
* Ensure the page is fully responsive across all devices, including desktop, laptop, tablet, and mobile.
* Maintain design consistency by closely following the provided Figma file, including correct spacing, typography, and image alignment.
* Properly integrate dynamic elements tailored to each region, ensuring accurate functionality and localization.
* Stay up to date with eCommerce page-building best practices and suggest improvements when appropriate.

**Qualifications:**

* Proven experience in building responsive product pages using GemPages (experience with Shopify is a plus).
* Strong understanding of UI/UX design principles, with a focus on creating engaging, conversion-optimized pages.
* Experience working with D2C eCommerce brands, understanding the nuances of creating product pages that drive conversions and align with brand identity.
* Proficiency in Figma for design handoff, ensuring accurate implementation of layouts and visual elements.

**CVs must be in English**

title: Product Owner - Stockholm
description:
As a Product Owner within IT4IT, you serve as a key link between stakeholders, business strategy, IT strategy, and the day-to-day execution of the development team.


You contribute to the product vision with a strong emphasis on user-centricity. The role involves defining and prioritizing work, maintaining a clear and tactical product backlog, and guiding the team in balancing trade-offs. You ensure a customer-oriented approach and take responsibility for follow-up and clear communication of outcomes.


The product in focus is primarily an internal tool designed to support traceability in line with frameworks such as ITIL and ITSM, while also addressing needs from a development and IT project management perspective.


Facilitating smooth integration between business and IT to develop digital solutions that truly meet user needs and deliver tangible value.

* Optimized for cost-effectiveness
* Built with security as a foundation
* Designed around user experience and usability


The role is based at Solna (onshore presence, approximately 60% onsite), collaborating with a distributed team based in Sweden and partially in India.  

  

**Experience:**  

  

We’re looking for someone with at least 5 years of relevant experience in product ownership or a similar role.**1- Product Vision**  

  

You should be confident in:

* Identifying and clearly explaining user problems and business needs
* Breaking down strategy into concrete tasks that create real value
* Communicating the bigger picture (the product vision) clearly to your team
* Listening to the development team's input, understanding their technical constraints, and helping balance priorities and trade-offs
* Supporting the team to stay aligned with the vision, while being open to change when needed


This role requires a good balance of strategic thinking and hands-on collaboration with your team.  

  

**2- Decision Making**


You should be comfortable:

* Making well-informed decisions about what features to prioritize and how to handle development challenges
* Weighing risks, costs, and trade-offs when planning product work
* Reviewing and learning from outcomes to improve future decisions and influence product direction

  

**3- Stakeholder Management**
You’ll need to:

* Work effectively with different stakeholders, even in complex setups
* Collaborate with both business and technical teams to achieve successful results for users and the organization
* Support larger strategic initiatives by identifying opportunities for collaboration and keeping everyone aligned across teams, markets, and services

  

**4- Leadership**
You should be able to:

* Guide and support the development team, creating an environment built on trust and continuous learning
* Encourage team members to take ownership and grow
* Act as a connector—bringing people together across different teams and departments to collaborate effectively

**5- User-Centric Mindset**


We’re looking for someone who:

* Actively listens to and analyzes user feedback
* Keeps the user's needs at the heart of product decisions
* Promotes a team culture that focuses on delivering real value to the end user or customer—and consistently follows up to ensure this value is achieved

  

**Nice-to-have qualifications:*** Understanding of the Atlassian ecosystem and its products
* Relevant certifications like Certified Scrum Product Owner (CSPO) or Atlassian Certified Professional (ACP)
* Experience applying UX design practices such as creating wireframes and prototypes
* Familiarity with DevOps tools and processes, especially CI/CD pipelines
* Hands-on experience with ITSM tools beyond Atlassian—e.g., ServiceNow or BMC Remedy
* Knowledge of cloud platforms, especially Azure, and how they connect with Atlassian tools
* Solid grasp of ITSM concepts and frameworks, such as ITIL
* Practical experience using and managing Atlassian tools, especially Jira and Confluence
* Background in Agile ways of working and collaborating in Agile teams
* Swedish language skills (spoken and written) are a strong plus

  

**Start Date & Application:**
Start of the assignment: 18-Aug-2025  

End of the assignment: 04-Sep-2026  

Deadline: 13-Jun-2025
  

Location: Solna  

Contact Person: 0790 062 711  

Selections and interviews are ongoing!


Sway Sourcing is an innovative recruitment partner specializing in matching the right talent with the right company—quickly and efficiently. Our primary focus areas are Finance, Administration, HR, Marketing, and IT, but we also have the broad expertise and flexibility needed to deliver tailored recruitment solutions across all industries.


Although we are a relatively new player in the market, we have already gained the trust of many of Sweden’s largest companies and operate both nationally and internationally. With offices in Sweden and Spain, we offer a unique combination of local expertise and global reach. Our strong network and deep industry insights make us a natural partner for companies looking to stay ahead in their recruitment efforts.

title: Digital Creative Manager
description:
**Location**
------------

Stockholm


**Level**
---------

Manager


**Department**
--------------

Commercial


**Employment type**
-------------------

Full-time

  

TOTEME is a fashion house rooted in Swedish sensibilities, modern aspirations and the notion of style. With an appreciation for women’s many roles and how pieces are worn in practice, we create emblematic designs with an emphasis on materiality and shape. Representing a direct and decisive way of dressing, the collections are contextualized in curated edits, visuals and spaces. The company is rooted in values that promote the wellbeing of people, animals, and the planet.  

  

TOTEME was founded in 2014 by Elin Kling and Karl Lindman. From the atelier in Stockholm, we create collections spanning ready-to-wear, shoes, bags, accessories and jewelry.


TOTEME is looking for a Digital Creative Manager to join our Ecommerce team full-time in Stockholm. In this role, you will oversee and elevate the digital design, functionality, and commercial content experience across TOTEME’s global online channels, including the website, app, newsletters, and special projects. Blending brand storytelling with commercial impact, you will lead creative briefs and collaborate closely with internal teams such as design, brand, development, and marketing to shape a premium and consistent digital brand experience. This role reports to the Head of Ecommerce.


RESPONSIBILITIES


* Lead creative strategy and asset planning for all digital commercial channels, ensuring a digital-first approach that balances visual impact with conversion goals.
* Own commercial shoot briefings and translate creative direction into functional, engaging brand experiences online.
* Oversee launches across digital platforms, including toteme.com, the TOTEME app, and newsletters.
* Brief internal and external teams on digital deliverables, managing the creation and implementation of assets across commercial channels.
* Partner with developers and product teams to implement UX enhancements and drive continuous site improvements.
* Collaborate with the Marketing team on content and layout strategy for ecommerce and app pages, campaign storytelling, and curated edits.
* Collaborate with merchandising, buying, and marketing teams to align execution with commercial and seasonal strategies.
* Apply a test-and-learn methodology to improve digital performance through content, UX features, and storytelling.
* Maintain creative consistency across all digital outputs, acting as a guardian of TOTEME’s visual identity and creative principles.
* Support internal teams with commercial collateral for private clients, retail, and sales initiatives.
* Participate in and contribute to TOTEME’s sustainability strategy through conscious buying decisions.


YOUR PROFILE


* 5+ years in a similar digital creative role, ideally within luxury fashion or an adjacent industry.
* Proven experience in team leadership and cross-functional collaboration.
* Extensive experience working with developers, product teams, and studio creatives on high-impact digital content.
* Strong commercial mindset with the ability to translate creative concepts into business-driving solutions.
* Passionate about digital innovation and emerging technology in fashion ecommerce.
* Confident managing brand expression across global markets while adapting to local user needs.
* Fluent in spoken and written English.


ABOUT YOU


* A creative thinker with a structured and strategic mindset.
* Able to balance design excellence with business goals and data-driven insights.
* Clear and confident communicator who thrives in collaborative, cross-functional environments.
* Proactive and independent, with a strong sense of ownership from concept through execution.
* Always curious and forward-thinking, with a passion for digital innovation and standout brand experiences.


This is a full-time position based at TOTEME's headquarters in Stockholm, starting as soon as possible.


TOTEME has teams in Stockholm, London, and New York, as well as retail spaces across Europe, North America, and Asia. As a member of our dynamic, creative, and highly collaborative team, you will take part in exciting projects and milestones, evolving within your role as you contribute to the company’s growth.


TOTEME stands for inclusivity and a sense of belonging in the workplace. We welcome all applicants and recruit on the basis of skills and experience.


By applying to this position I agree with TOTEME’s privacy policy and to be contacted about future job opportunities for up to 2 years from the submission date.

title: Senior UX Designer - Tietoevry Create (m/f/d)
description:
**Job Description**  

Senior UX Designer – Tietoevry Create

  

**Är du redo att ta nästa steg i din karriär och arbeta med digitala tjänster för några nordens ledande varumärken?** Har du ett intresse för användarvänlig design och vill jobba i en miljö där vi kombinerar teknik och kreativitet för att skapa smarta digitala lösningar? Då är Tietoevry Create rätt plats för dig!

  

Vi arbetar tillsammans med några av Nordens ledande varumärken för att utveckla digitala tjänster som är funktionella, tillgängliga och värdeskapande. Nu söker vi en UX Designer till vårt designteam i Göteborg.

  

Om rollen

**Som UX Designer hos oss kommer du att:**

* Arbeta i tvärfunktionella team tillsammans med utvecklare, produktägare och affärsutvecklare.
* Ta fram designlösningar baserade på användarinsikter, affärsbehov och tekniska möjligheter.
* Skapa prototyper, användarflöden och gränssnitt som gör det lättare för människor att använda digitala tjänster.
* Delta i användartester och research för att säkerställa att våra lösningar är relevanta och fungerar i praktiken.


Vem vi söker

**Vi tror att du:**

* Har en relevant utbildning inom UX, interaktionsdesign eller motsvarande område.
* Har stark förståelse för UX-grunder, typografi, layout och färgteori samt erfarenhet av att skapa och underhålla designsystem.
* Har minst fem års erfarenhet av att arbeta med UX, interaktionsdesign eller liknande.
* Är van vid att jobba i Figma.
* Har förståelse för tillgänglighet och WCAG-standarder.
* Trivs i en roll där du både får arbeta strategiskt och hands-on.
* Är bekväm med att presentera och motivera dina designval för både team och kunder.
* Är flytande i svenska och engelska, både i tal och skrift.

  

Att jobba på Tietoevry Create


Hos Tietoevry Create får du möjlighet att arbeta med spännande projekt inom olika branscher, tillsammans med välkända varumärken som Sandvik, Libero, Libresse, Bjurfors, Volvo mfl.

 **Vi erbjuder:**

* En flexibel arbetsmiljö med möjlighet till hybridarbete.
* Stöd för din utveckling genom kompetensutveckling och interna nätverk.
* Ett öppet och inkluderande arbetsklimat där vi lär av varandra.
* Möjlighet att arbeta med lösningar som verkligen gör skillnad för människor och samhälle.


Ansökan


Låter detta intressant? Skicka in din ansökan med CV och portfolio så snart som möjligt. Vi hanterar ansökningar löpande.

  

Har du frågor om rollen? Kontakta oss gärna! - Vi ser fram emot att höra från dig!

 **Additional Information**  

At Tietoevry, we believe in the power of diversity, equity, and inclusion. We encourage applicants of all backgrounds, genders (m/f/d), and walks of life to join our team, as we believe that this fosters an inspiring workplace and fuels innovation. Our commitment to openness, trust, and diversity is at the heart of our mission to create digital futures that benefit businesses, societies, and humanity.


Diversity, equity and inclusion (tietoevry.com)

title: Digital Analyst Trainee
description:
Are you passionate about digital analytics? Fortum is looking for a motivated intern (LIA) to join our E-commerce team. This is a unique opportunity to gain hands-on experience in digital analytics while contributing to the energy transition.  

**About the role:**

As an intern, you will work with user behavior and traffic data using tools such as GA4, Google Tag Manager, ABTasty, MS Clarity and Looker Studio. You will help build dashboards and reports that support data-driven decision-making. You will also participate in A/B testing and optimization projects for our e-commerce platform, and collaborate with marketing, UX, and development teams to improve the customer journey. Throughout the internship, you will gain insight into how a leading energy company drives digital transformation.  

**About you:**

We are looking for someone who is currently studying digital analytics. You should have basic knowledge of GA4, Excel or Google Sheets, and preferably some experience with data visualization tools. You are analytical, curious, and enjoy solving problems. An interest in sustainability and the energy sector is a strong plus.  

**We offer you:**

At Fortum, we offer a meaningful internship where your work contributes to power a world where people, businesses and nature thrive together. You will have the opportunity to build your professional network within one of the Nordics’ leading energy companies. You will be supported by experienced colleagues and a dedicated mentor with the possibility to work hybrid.  

**Interested?**

Submit your CV by 15.06.2025 at the latest. We have ongoing selections and we might call for interviews on an ongoing basis. If you would like to hear more about the position, please contact Elin Grass at elin.grass@fortum.com.  

**We are Fortum**  

Fortum is a Nordic energy company. Our purpose is to power a world where people, businesses and nature thrive together. We are one of the cleanest energy producers in Europe and our actions are guided by our ambitious environmental targets. We generate and deliver clean energy reliably and help industries to decarbonise their processes and grow. Our core operations in the Nordics comprise of efficient, CO2-free power generation as well as reliable supply of electricity and district heat to private and business customers. For our ~5 000 employees, we commit to be a safe, and inspiring workplace. Fortum's share is listed on Nasdaq Helsinki. fortum.com.
company_description: Fortum is a Nordic energy company. Our purpose is to power a world where people, businesses and nature thrive together. We are one of the cleanest energy producers in Europe.

title: Social Media Manager
description:
* *Ansök senast: 16 juni 2025*
* *Stockholm*
***Arbetsuppgifter***
---------------------

*Vi söker en erfaren Social Media Manager som vill ta vårt varumärke till nästa nivå genom strategiskt och kreativt arbete i sociala medier.*

***Ditt team***

*I rollen ingår du i ett tight sammansvetsat team på fyra sociala medie-experter där samarbete och delaktighet står i fokus. Du arbetar nära våra inhouse-kreatörer och deras team, som levererar allt från bilder och grafik till video och rörligt material, vilket gör att ditt arbete alltid är väl förankrat i professionellt innehåll. Teamet är en viktig del av vår bredare marknadsorganisation och har ett tvärfunktionellt samarbete med experter inom analys, SEO, UX och strategi. Tillsammans skapar ni förutsättningar för att utveckla innovativa aktiviteter som både engagerar och levererar resultat. Som en nyckelspelare i vårt digitala kommunikationsteam får du en central roll i att utveckla vår närvaro på plattformar som Instagram, Facebook och LinkedIn. Du arbetar både strategiskt och operativt, från planering och innehållsproduktion till analys och optimering.*

***Din roll***

*Som Social Media Manager är du ansvarig för att implementera och vidareutveckla vår strategi för sociala medier med fokus på att stärka hela bankens varumärke. Du vägleder och coachar våra kontor i deras arbete med lokala Facebook-sidor och stöttar i utvecklingen av betalda kampanjer på Facebook, Instagram och LinkedIn. I nära samarbete med våra kreatörer skapar du innehåll som engagerar och bidrar till att öka varumärkeskännedomen och driva trafik till vår webbplats. Du använder avancerade analyser och attributionsmodeller för att mäta och optimera effekten av våra sociala aktiviteter, och du tar fram guidelines och material som underlättar arbetet lokalt. Med ett öga för trender och innovation utforskar du också nya sätt att bygga community och förnyar arbetet med hjälp av AI-verktyg och datadrivna metoder. I din roll är du både strateg och operativ, med ansvar för hela kundresan i sociala medier från idé till resultat.*

***Vi har riktigt bra förmåner***
---------------------------------

* *Tjänstepension*
* *Vinstdelningssystem*
* *Gruppförsäkring*
* *Friskvårdsbidrag*
* *Bidrag vid föräldraledighet*
* *Banktjänster*
* *Banking services*
* *Benefit in connection with parental leave*
* *Health promotion subsidy*
* *Group insurance*
* *Occupational pension*
* *Profit-sharing scheme*
***Kvalifikationer***
---------------------

***Din profil***

*Du har gedigen erfarenhet av att arbeta med sociala medier i både organiska och betalda sammanhang, och har dokumenterad förmåga att bygga och stärka varumärken genom kanaler som Facebook, Instagram och LinkedIn. Du har en djup förståelse för hur sociala medier integreras i kundresan tillsammans med andra digitala kanaler, och du är van att arbeta datadrivet med attributionsmodeller för att mäta och optimera insatserna. Du tar ansvar för hela processen från idé till analys och trivs med att coacha andra och skapa utbildande material som stärker organisationens sociala kompetens. Kreativitet och självgående arbetsstil kombinerar du med ett skarpt öga för både tonalitet och visuellt uttryck. Att navigera i en komplex organisation och samarbeta över många kontaktytor är naturligt för dig, och du är trygg i att hantera snabba förändringar och högt tempo. Erfarenhet av AI-verktyg och moderna produktionsmetoder är meriterande och något du ser som en möjlighet att utveckla vår sociala närvaro ytterligare.*

*Om du vill bidra till att forma hur vi syns och engagerar i sociala medier, och trivs i en dynamisk miljö där ditt arbete verkligen gör skillnad, ser vi fram emot att höra från dig.*

*Urval och intervjuer sker löpande, så skicka gärna in din ansökan så snart som möjligt*

***Välkommen med din ansökan!***

***Kontaktuppgifter***

***Rekryterande chef:*** *Fredrik Steigård, +46730325992, fredrik.steigard@handelsbanken.se*  

***Talent Acquisition Partner:*** *Matilda Lyngéus, matilda.lyngeus@handelsbanken.se*  

***Facklig representant Finansförbundet:*** *Ronita Bergman, +46702499223, ronita.bergman@handelsbanken.se*  

***Facklig representant Akademikerföreningen:*** *Ingrid Widgren, +46708644140, ingrid.widgren@handelsbanken.se ,*


  
**Om företaget**
----------------

Hos oss får du ett stort eget ansvar och möjlighet att påverka din egen och bankens framtida utveckling. Våra olika perspektiv, insikter och innovativa idéer utgör en grund för hur vi tillsammans bygger vidare banken för framtiden. För oss är utveckling allt och när du utvecklas, utvecklas banken.


Vi har ett unikt sätt att bedriva bank som bygger på en stark tilltro och respekt för den enskilda människan. Våra värderingar och starka företagskultur har en avgörande betydelse för vår framgång och guidar oss om hur vi uppnår våra mål, samarbetar och stöttar varandra. Genom stark lokal förankring, ett decentraliserat arbetssätt och ett långsiktigt perspektiv skapar vi hållbara relationer genom livets olika skeenden. Hos oss på Handelsbanken är alla viktiga. Vi kommer från olika platser med olika bakgrund, erfarenhet och utbildning. Tillsammans är vi Handelsbanken.

title: UX/UI Designer with Frontend Development Skills -Nolimit City
description:
**Company Description**  

Evolution is a multinational business at the forefront of the online gaming industry. We have an extensive track record of number 1s and are always looking for great people to help us create the next big product hit. Our team of 1,000+ engineers operates out of 8 engineering hubs running code 24/7/365 to serve users around the world. This is run through a modern software stack that supports over 250 fully automated releases per month in our main live environment. We believe in building in-house competence and agile work processes so that we can deliver on our Engineering mission: *A flawless player experience.*


Our integrated business-to-business solutions guarantee that our clients can always provide an unrivalled online entertainment experience to their players globally. We thrive on remaining an award-winning digital powerhouse of entertainment products and services with an ever-expanding line-up of product brands: Evolution Live, NetEnt, Red Tiger, Ezugi, Big Time Gaming, Nolimit City and DigiWheel.

 **Job Description**  

You will belong to a team who has its roots in Nolimit City (part of Evolution). Nolimit has derived from hands on work at some of the most successful gambling software providers and operators over the last 15 years. This is a challenging and exciting role where you will be part of a team dedicated to creating solutions that redefine our industry. By working in small, highly collaborative teams, you and your team will have clear ownership of one of our most important new initiatives at Evolution.  

  

We create world-class gaming products with bold, uncompromising design and unmatched attention to detail. We're looking for a UX/UI Designer who doesn't just stop at the design phase — you also bring your ideas to life in code.  

  

You'll join a cross-functional product team with full ownership over the solutions you design, working on innovative and highly interactive user experiences seen by players around the world. You’ll collaborate closely with engineers to bring your ideas to life—creating products that are both beautiful and usable. Depending on your experience, you might implement parts of the frontend yourself or work alongside developers to ensure your vision is realized in the final product.

**What You'll Do**

* Lead UX and UI design efforts for new and existing products — from user flows and wireframes to high-fidelity mockups.
* Translate your designs into functional, responsive, and accessible frontend components using React (Next.js) and TypeScript.
* Partner with developers and stakeholders to iterate on solutions, run experiments, and refine interfaces based on user feedback and performance data.
* Build and maintain components in a shared design system, ensuring consistency and scalability across products.
* Advocate for user-centered design throughout the product development process.

  

**Qualifications** **You Might Be a Great Fit If You**

* Have a strong background in UX/UI design, with a portfolio showcasing thoughtful, elegant interfaces and interaction design.
* Are fluent in modern design tools like Figma, and enjoy prototyping and testing user flows.
* Know how to write clean, maintainable frontend code using React and TypeScript.
* Are comfortable working with developers and understand how design decisions impact performance and implementation.
* Care deeply about usability, accessibility, and the overall user experience.
* Enjoy working in a fast-paced, collaborative environment where experimentation is encouraged.

**Bonus Points**

* Experience with Next.js, Redux Toolkit, or Headless CMSs like Strapi.
* Familiarity with A/B testing, analytics, and data-driven design decisions.
* An understanding of game or entertainment product design patterns.

**Technologies You'll Touch**

* Figma (or other tools you prefer) / Design Systems
* React / Next.js
* TypeScript / JavaScript
* Redux Toolkit
* CSS / Tailwind CSS
* Strapi (Headless CMS)
* Git (GitHub Actions)

  

**Additional Information**  

Exciting opportunity at our brand new office in the heart of Stockholm with amazing colleagues! Join our dynamic international team and be a part of a vibrant work environment where innovation thrives. Embrace the city´s energy as you contribute to our company´s growth!  

  

Evolution provides a dynamic and creative work environment with a unique opportunity for the right people to enhance their skills and drive their passion. We operate guided by our vision to become the leading supplier of online casino in the world.

**Our benefits are**

* Competitive pension, health and medical insurance
* 30 paid vacation days
* Fitness benefit (Friskvårdsbidrag)
* Professional growth
* Sport activities, parties, team buildings


We welcome a diverse range of applicants and believe that different perspectives drive success. This is a hybrid position based in Stockholm, Sweden.


If you want to be part of one of the most exciting industries in the world, then apply now and be a key player in our success story!
company_description: We are pioneers in the Online Casino Industry and we are looking for talent like you to join us in our Evolution!

title: Frontend Engineer
description:
Your Role
  
We are looking for a skilled and creative Frontend Engineer to join our product development team. In this role, you will craft user-centric, high-performance web interfaces that enable customers and internal teams to interact with our AI-powered solutions. You’ll work closely with UX designers, backend engineers, and product managers to bring complex data and workflows to life in a clean and intuitive way. If you're passionate about building elegant, maintainable UIs and enjoy working in a collaborative, fast-paced environment, we’d love to meet you.
  
  

Your Responsibilities
  
Design and implement modern, responsive web applications using React and Next.js
  
Translate complex product and user requirements into functional, intuitive UIs
  
Collaborate with designers to refine user experiences based on feedback and usability testing
  
Work closely with backend engineers to integrate APIs and manage data flows efficiently
  
Ensure frontend code is modular, testable, performant, and accessible
  
Optimize applications for speed and scalability across browsers and devices
  
Contribute to component libraries, design systems, and internal best practices
  
Debug, test, and proactively improve frontend reliability and usability
  
Participate in sprint planning, code reviews, and cross-functional collaboration
  
  

Your Skills
  
Required Skills & Experience
  
3+ years of professional experience as a frontend developer or engineer
  
Deep knowledge of modern JavaScript/TypeScript and frameworks like React and Next.js
  
Solid understanding of HTML5, CSS3, and frontend build tools
  
Experience integrating RESTful APIs and managing asynchronous data
  
Strong UX mindset and attention to design detail
  
Familiarity with frontend testing frameworks (e.g., Jest, Testing Library)
  
Version control experience with Git and collaborative development practices
  
Ability to work independently and manage tasks in an agile team environment
  
Good communication skills and the ability to work across functional teams
  
  

Nice to Have
  
Experience with backend-for-frontend (BFF)
  
Familiarity with design systems such as Storybook or Material UI
  
Exposure to cloud environments (e.g., GCP or AWS)
  
Interest or background in video, media, or streaming tech
  
Understanding of CI/CD workflows for frontend applications
  
  

Why Join Us?
  
The opportunity to work at the forefront of AI and media technology
  
A collaborative and fast-paced environment where your contributions make an impact
  
Competitive salary and benefits
  
Hybrid work flexibility
  
Growth opportunities in an expanding company

title: Product Owner
description:
Om tjänsten Our customer is now looking for a product owner, between 18-aug-2025 - 04-sep-2026
  
  

* As a product owner for IT4IT you’re responsible acting as a bridge between stakeholders, business strategy, IT strategy and the practical execution of the development team.


Contributing to the product vision, specifically maintaining a focus on user-centricity. You define and prioritize work, maintain a clear and tactical product backlog, and lead the team in negotiating trade-offs, ensure customer-centricity and follows-up and communicates on outcomes.
  
This for a tool mainly used internally to enable traceability according to ITIL, ITSM but also from a development and ITPMO perspective.
  
  

Driving seamless collaboration between business and IT to deliver user-focused digital products that create real value.
  
  

* Cost efficient.
* Secure.
* User centric focused platform.


Location in Solna with a team located in Sweden and partly in India.
  
  

Kvalifikationer
  
* Must-have:


Product Vision
  
Responsible for clearly framing problems, needs and articulating potential impact if solved. Translating strategy into actionable and value creating tasks. Communicating Product Vision and listening to development teams’ constraints, needs and related trade-offs to support alignment when possible and adaptability when needed.
  
  

Decision Making
  
Make informed decisions, from feature prioritization to overcoming development challenges, negotiating risk, financial concerns and associated trade-offs. Follow up and evaluate results to guide future decisions, to impact future product strategy.
  
  

Stakeholder Management
  
Navigate complex stakeholder relationships and effectively collaborate to enable successful outcomes for business and user. Tactically engage with strategic initiatives to find synergies and support alignment between teams, markets, and product/service development.
  
  

Leadership
  
Lead, coach, and facilitate a culture of trust, empowerment, and continuous improvement within the development team. Acting as a catalyst for collaboration across teams and departments.
  
  

User Centricity
  
Engage with, analyze, and nurture user feedback. Put their needs and preferences at the center of decision-making and foster a culture that prioritizes and follows up on value for the user or customer.
  
  

Agile Methodologies
  
* effective Communication


Integrated Approach
  
Servant Leadership Agile Methodologies
  
Compliance
  
Relationship Building
  
Collaborative
  
Result Oriented
  
Innovative
  
  

**Good-to-have :**  

* Knowledge of Atlassian products and landscape
* Atlassian certification(s) such as Certified Scrum Product Owner (CSPO) or Atlassian Certified Professional (ACP).
* Experience with user experience (UX) design principles and techniques, including wireframing and prototyping.
* Knowledge of DevOps practices and tools, such as continuous integration/continuous delivery (CI/CD) pipelines.
* Previous experience with IT Service Management tools other than Atlassian, such as ServiceNow or BMC Remedy.
* Familiarity with cloud computing platforms, particularly Azure, and their integration with Atlassian applications.
* Strong understanding of IT Service Management principles and frameworks, such as ITIL.
* Experience with Atlassian tools, particularly Jira and Confluence, including configuration and administration.
* Familiarity with Agile methodologies and experience working in Agile teams
* Swedish in soeaking and writing is a strong advantage


Om arbetsgivaren 21Activa är ett bemannings- och rekryteringsföretag med över 50 års samlad erfarenhet från bemannings- och rekryteringsbranschen.Vi har stor erfarenhet av bemanning inom lager, logistik, transport och administration, både på arbetar-och tjänstemannasidan.
  
Vi har självklart kollektivavtal och är auktoriserade hos Kompetensföretagen. Vi sitter i lokaler i Rosersbergs och i Arlandastads industriområde och våra kunder finns i Stockholmsområdet, Uppsala och i Mälardalen.Vår filosofi är enkel, vi ska vara samarbetspartnern som finns på plats för våra kunder OCH vi ska ha den mest nöjda personalen i branschen. För välmående personal gör ett bättre jobb och kunderna når bättre resultat.

title: Senior Service Designer
description:
At Cliff Design, we focus on design! We are working with project based commitments in our own studio and as design consultants on site at our clients design departments. We constantly need to be challenged and are always interested in connecting with dedicated creative souls. Now, we’re looking for a Service Designer to join our team!
  
  

About the Role
  
As a Service Designer, you’ll be at the heart of shaping meaningful experiences for the user. You’ll work closely with clients, stakeholders, and cross-functional teams to research, design, and prototype new services, ensuring they meet user needs and business goals. Your work will inform service strategies, improve operational processes, and deliver value at every touchpoint.
  
Responsibilities
  
* Lead and participate in service design projects from discovery to delivery. • Conduct user research, journey mapping, and stakeholder interviews to understand needs. • Develop and visualize service blueprints, experience maps, and prototypes to communicate design concepts. • Collaborate with designers, researchers, product managers, and developers to bring ideas to life. • Facilitate workshops and co-creation sessions with internal teams and clients. • Advocate for human-centered design principles and best practices.


About You
  
* Proven experience in Service Design, UX Design, or related fields. • You have 6+ years of experience working with customer experience, service design, journey mapping, or brand experience—ideally in a B2B or industrial setting. • Strong research and analytical skills, with the ability to translate insights into actionable design concepts. • Proficiency in design tools (e.g., Miro, Figma, Sketch, Adobe Creative Suite). • Excellent communication and facilitation skills to work with diverse stakeholders. • A portfolio demonstrating service design projects and your design process. • Ability to drive, motivate and convince • Communicative with good verbal and visual presentation skills • Independent and confident as well as a good team player • Structured, methodical, and analytical with good planning skills • English, spoken and written


What We Offer
  
* A dynamic and collaborative environment where your ideas matter. • Opportunities for professional development and growth. • Competitive salary and benefits package. • A chance to work on meaningful projects that make a real impact.


Ready to Design the Future of Services? Apply now by sending your CV and portfolio (pdf-design portfolio max 8 Mb file size or a web portfolio link). We can’t wait to see what you’ll bring to the table!

title: Product Owner - Stockholm
description:
As a Product Owner within IT4IT, you serve as a key link between stakeholders, business strategy, IT strategy, and the day-to-day execution of the development team.
  
You contribute to the product vision with a strong emphasis on user-centricity. The role involves defining and prioritizing work, maintaining a clear and tactical product backlog, and guiding the team in balancing trade-offs. You ensure a customer-oriented approach and take responsibility for follow-up and clear communication of outcomes.
  
The product in focus is primarily an internal tool designed to support traceability in line with frameworks such as ITIL and ITSM, while also addressing needs from a development and IT project management perspective.
  
Facilitating smooth integration between business and IT to develop digital solutions that truly meet user needs and deliver tangible value.
  
* Optimized for cost-effectiveness • Built with security as a foundation • Designed around user experience and usability The role is based at Solna (onshore presence, approximately 60% onsite), collaborating with a distributed team based in Sweden and partially in India. Experience: We’re looking for someone with at least 5 years of relevant experience in product ownership or a similar role.


**1- Product Vision You should be confident in:**  

* Identifying and clearly explaining user problems and business needs • Breaking down strategy into concrete tasks that create real value • Communicating the bigger picture (the product vision) clearly to your team • Listening to the development team's input, understanding their technical constraints, and helping balance priorities and trade-offs • Supporting the team to stay aligned with the vision, while being open to change when needed


This role requires a good balance of strategic thinking and hands-on collaboration with your team. 2- Decision Making
  
  

**You should be comfortable:**  

* Making well-informed decisions about what features to prioritize and how to handle development challenges • Weighing risks, costs, and trade-offs when planning product work • Reviewing and learning from outcomes to improve future decisions and influence product direction 3- Stakeholder Management


**You’ll need to:**  

* Work effectively with different stakeholders, even in complex setups • Collaborate with both business and technical teams to achieve successful results for users and the organization • Support larger strategic initiatives by identifying opportunities for collaboration and keeping everyone aligned across teams, markets, and services 4- Leadership


**You should be able to:**  

* Guide and support the development team, creating an environment built on trust and continuous learning • Encourage team members to take ownership and grow • Act as a connector—bringing people together across different teams and departments to collaborate effectively


5- User-Centric Mindset
  
  

**We’re looking for someone who:**  

* Actively listens to and analyzes user feedback • Keeps the user's needs at the heart of product decisions • Promotes a team culture that focuses on delivering real value to the end user or customer—and consistently follows up to ensure this value is achieved Nice-to-have qualifications:
* Understanding of the Atlassian ecosystem and its products • Relevant certifications like Certified Scrum Product Owner (CSPO) or Atlassian Certified Professional (ACP) • Experience applying UX design practices such as creating wireframes and prototypes • Familiarity with DevOps tools and processes, especially CI/CD pipelines • Hands-on experience with ITSM tools beyond Atlassian—e.g., ServiceNow or BMC Remedy • Knowledge of cloud platforms, especially Azure, and how they connect with Atlassian tools • Solid grasp of ITSM concepts and frameworks, such as ITIL • Practical experience using and managing Atlassian tools, especially Jira and Confluence • Background in Agile ways of working and collaborating in Agile teams • Swedish language skills (spoken and written) are a strong plus Start Date & Application:


**Start of the assignment:** 18-Aug-2025 End of the assignment: 04-Sep-2026 Deadline: 13-Jun-2025 Location: Solna Contact Person: 0790 062 711 Selections and interviews are ongoing!
  
Sway Sourcing is an innovative recruitment partner specializing in matching the right talent with the right company—quickly and efficiently. Our primary focus areas are Finance, Administration, HR, Marketing, and IT, but we also have the broad expertise and flexibility needed to deliver tailored recruitment solutions across all industries.
  
Although we are a relatively new player in the market, we have already gained the trust of many of Sweden’s largest companies and operate both nationally and internationally. With offices in Sweden and Spain, we offer a unique combination of local expertise and global reach. Our strong network and deep industry insights make us a natural partner for companies looking to stay ahead in their recruitment efforts.

title: Agent Engineer
description:
**Vi söker en Agent Engineer till Knowit Experience i Malmö!**


På **Knowit Experience** kombinerar vi teknik, design och kommunikation för att skapa upplevelser som gör verklig skillnad. Nu söker vi en Agent Engineer som vill vara med och utforska gränslandet mellan generativ AI, automation och användarupplevelse. Du blir en nyckelspelare i vårt team där vi bygger autonoma agentlösningar med hjälp av språkmodeller, verktygskedjor och smart arkitektur. Tillsammans med designers, utvecklare och strateger skapar du lösningar som både känns och fungerar bättre – för människor och samhälle.

**Din roll hos oss**  

I rollen som Agent Engineer kommer du att vara med och bygga intelligenta, agentbaserade lösningar som gör verklig skillnad – både för våra kunder och användarna de når. Du kommer att arbeta praktiskt med att utveckla autonoma system med hjälp av ramverk som LangChain, Semantic Kernel eller andra liknande teknologier. Med stöd av kraftfulla språkmodeller som GPT, Claude eller Mistral skapar du smarta, automatiserade flöden där AI inte bara svarar – utan agerar.


Du tar ansvar för hela kedjan, från att designa lösningar med fokus på användarcentrerad AI, till att arbeta med prompt engineering och integration av externa verktyg och API:er. I vårt team samarbetar du tätt med UX-designers, utvecklare och strateger i agila projekt, där ni tillsammans experimenterar, testar och förfinar lösningarna steg för steg – alltid med nyfikenheten som drivkraft.

**Är det här du?**  

Vi tror att du har goda kunskaper i Python eller TypeScript och redan hunnit arbeta med språkmodeller eller liknande AI-teknik. Du är nyfiken av naturen, och du gillar att hitta lösningar där andra ser hinder. Kanske har du redan erfarenhet av att jobba med molnplattformar som Azure, AWS eller GCP, och är bekväm med att integrera API:er i dina projekt. Har du dessutom arbetat med vektordatabaser som Pinecone eller Weaviate, eller är insatt i RAG-tekniker och konversationsdesign, ser vi det som ett stort plus – men det är inget krav.

**Hos oss får du:**  

* Ett starkt och kreativt team i Malmö där vi jobbar tätt tillsammans
* Frihet att utforska och påverka framtidens AI-tillämpningar
* Kompetensutveckling, mentorskap och tillgång till hela Knowit-nätverket
* Möjlighet att jobba med spännande kunder inom både offentlig sektor, tech och kommersiella varumärken
* En arbetsplats där vi värderar öppenhet, hållbarhet och en sund livsbalans
**Om oss**  

Med start i vår vision att skapa ett hållbart och mänskligt samhälle har vi på Knowit under många år tillsammans med våra kunder skapat framtidens lösningar utifrån våra strategiska och kreativa teknikkunskaper. Helt enkelt lösningar som underlättar vardagen för både verksamheter och individer.

**Choose courage:** Vi tror på att modiga beslut och handlingar är grundläggande för att skapa framtidens digitala lösningar och driva positiv förändring.  

**Trust in transparency:** Vi värdesätter ärlighet och öppenhet som nyckelkomponenter för framgångsrika samarbeten och långsiktiga relationer.  

**What’s in it for we?** Vi reflekterar kontinuerligt över hur våra insatser gynnar inte bara oss själva, utan även våra kunder, våra team och samhället som helhet, för att skapa meningsfulla resultat.

**Ansökan**  

Känner du igen dig? Skicka då in CV samt gärna en kort beskrivning av dig själv (båda på svenska) direkt i vårt rekryteringssystem. Observera att vi inte hanterar någon ansökan som inkommer via direktmail.


Vi använder analyser i rekryteringsprocessen och har en kompetensbaserad urvalsprocess för att säkerställa en rättvis bedömning av dig som kandidat.

**Kontaktperson**  

För allmänna frågor om Knowit och tjänsten, kontakta:  

Carolina Jonsson, People & Culture Knowit Syd – carolina.m.jonsson@knowit.se

title: Brand Designer
description:
**Brand Designer -** 
**Ta vårt varumärke till nästa nivå med kreativ strategi!**
 Vi letar efter en kreativ designer som vill ta en nyckelroll i Greenelys tillväxtresa. Om du älskar att skapa varumärken som verkligen berör, är nyfiken på innovation och vill ha stort inflytande i ett snabbt växande bolag, då är detta din chans.
   

  

**Om rollen**
 Som Brand Designer hos Greenely blir du en viktig del av vår expansion och får sätta din kreativa prägel på allt från digitala kampanjer till produktupplevelser. Du kommer att samarbeta med marknad och produkt för att forma en stark och konsekvent visuell identitet. Vi ser dig som en visionär som kan översätta idéer till uttrycksfull design som engagerar och bygger långsiktig varumärkeskärlek.
   

  

**Vad du kommer göra**
* Forma och utveckla Greenelys varumärke i alla kanaler
* Skapa visuellt innehåll för digitala annonser, sociala medier, webb och tryckt material
* Utveckla design riktlinjer och säkerställa att de används konsekvent
* Arbeta nära marknadsteamet för att ta fram kreativa koncept som förstärker våra kampanjer
* Utforska nya designtrender och teknologier för att hålla varumärket relevant och inspirerande
* Bidra till produktdesign och användarupplevelse i vår mobilapp


**Vem vi tror att du är**
* Har cirka 3+ års erfarenhet av grafisk design eller brand design, gärna inom tech eller energi
* Har ett skarpt visuellt öga och kan förmedla idéer genom design
* Har erfarenhet av att skapa och implementera designriktlinjer
* Är van vid verktyg som Adobe Creative Suite, Sketch, Figma eller liknande
* Kan ta egna initiativ och driva designprojekt från idé till färdig lösning
* Har erfarenhet av att använda AI-verktyg i designprocessen och ser möjligheterna med AI inom kreativa branscher


**Vi erbjuder dig**
* Inflytande och påverkan - Din röst spelar roll. Forma framtidens energi genom att bidra med dina idéer och expertis.
* Innovativ miljö - Arbeta i en bransch i ständig förändring med banbrytande projekt och en dynamisk arbetsmiljö.
* Kreativ frihet - Få utrymme att utforska och testa nya idéer som stärker vårt varumärke och användarupplevelse.
* Snabb tillväxt - Var med och bygg upp ett scale-up där du har möjlighet att påverka både strategi och visuell identitet.
* Team & kultur - Bli en del av ett passionerat och engagerat team där samarbete och nytänkande står i fokus.


**Ansök med portfolio och CV – vi ser fram emot att höra från dig!**
**Om Greenely**
 Greenely har som mål att skapa den bästa kundupplevelsen för den moderna energikonsumenten genom teknik. Greenelys integrerade mobilapplikation gör det möjligt för hushåll att optimera sin energiförbrukning, minska sina elkostnader och delta i nätbalanseringstjänster. Genom att ansluta olika energitillgångar i hemmet gör Greenelys plattform det möjligt för konsumenter att effektivt hantera sin energianvändning samtidigt som de bidrar till stabiliteten i elsystemet. Greenelys lösning adresserar utmaningarna i det moderna energilandskapet och främjar ett mer effektivt, hållbart och pålitligt elsystem. Genom att ge konsumenter besparingar och nya intäktsströmmar driver Greenely övergången till ett renare och mer motståndskraftigt elsystem.
   

  

 WE ARE
 **bold and push the limit.**
 WE BELIEVE THAT
 **f** 
****ast is better than slow.****
 WE
 **t** 
******hink like owners.******
 WE
 ****lead with knowledge.****
 Greenely is on a mission to create the best customer experience for the modern energy consumer by using technology. We are a digital energy provider that helps people reduce their electricity costs by optimizing the home and car's electricity usage with smart technology in an app.
   

  

 Greenely, with the support of Nordic venture capital companies, has a mission to make it possible for households all over the world to connect, control and optimize their energy usage. We ultimately believe that the best electricity is the one that is not used at all, both for the wallet and the planet!

title: iOS Internship - HealthTech Startup Revolutionizing Sleep
description:
In line with what leading scientists say today:
 *“The most powerful biohack is getting a good night’s sleep,”* 
 we’re committed to developing the most effective natural sleep enhancement technology in the world.
 



  





  





**Introduction:** 




  





 Are you passionate about creating innovative mobile experiences that can impact global health? Join us in revolutionizing sleep health with cutting-edge technology as an
 **iOS Intern** 
 . We’re looking for a motivated, curious intern to work closely with our founding team on building what will become the most effective medically certified solution for improved sleep.
 



  





**About Us:** 




  





 We are a dynamic health tech startup, focused on addressing the widespread issue of poor sleep quality that affects billions worldwide. Our mission is to develop groundbreaking solutions that enhance sleep by using leading technology, including the latest advancements in wearables, AI, and scientific insights. If you’re passionate about improving sleep health and want hands-on experience in an early-stage startup, we want you on this journey.
 



  





**The Role:** 




  





 As our
 **iOS Intern** 
 , you will:
 



  




* **Participate in iOS App Development** 
 : Support in designing, building, and maintaining Swift code for our iOS app.
* **Biometric Data Integration** 
 : Work with frameworks like HealthKit, CoreMotion, etc., to collect and process real-time biometric data.
* **Real-Time Data Processing** 
 : Assist in implementing and testing algorithms for real-time data use.
* **UI/UX Implementation** 
 : Help ensure a smooth, intuitive user experience following Apple’s design guidelines.
* **Performance Optimization** 
 : Learn how to tune performance and optimize user experience.
* **Testing and Debugging** 
 : Write unit tests and debug issues alongside our QA team.
* **Collaboration** 
 : Participate in cross-functional teamwork with engineers, designers, and machine learning experts.
* **Stay Updated** 
 : Follow the latest iOS trends and contribute new ideas to the team.



  





**About You:** 




  




* Currently pursuing a degree in Computer Science, Engineering, or a related field
* Experience or coursework in
 **Swift** 
 and iOS development (UIKit, CoreData, etc.)
* Eager to learn about
 **Apple Watch** 
 ,
 **HealthKit** 
 , and
 **real-time data frameworks**
* Familiar with REST APIs and working with cloud services
* Strong interest in UI/UX design and Apple Human Interface Guidelines
* Excellent communication and problem-solving skills
* Curious, proactive, and passionate about health tech and mobile innovation



  





**Preferred Qualifications:** 




  




* Experience with
 **audio frameworks** 
 (CoreAudio) is a plus
* Basic understanding of
 **machine learning concepts**
* Exposure to
 **cross-platform frameworks** 
 like React Native is a bonus



  





**What We Offer:** 




  




* A meaningful internship role in a high-impact mission
* Mentorship and collaboration with a passionate founding team
* An opportunity to work on real product development from day one
* Flexibility, autonomy, and insight into startup culture
* Possibility of full-time opportunities post-internship



  





**Apply:** 




  





 Ready to make a difference in global sleep health? Please send us your application. We’re eager to embark on this impactful journey with you!
 



  





 The internship is unpaid but may lead to future employment incl. equity.

title: Digital Marketing & Growth Intern – Soulcircus
description:
📍 Stockholm, Sverige | ⏱ Heltid | 🗕 Juni 2025 | 💸 Betald praktik
 



  





 Brinner du för wellness, kreativ marknadsföring och digital tillväxt? På Soulcircus är vi på ett uppdrag att hjälpa människor att leva mer medvetna liv – genom en snabbt växande plattform som kopplar samman användare med erfarna lärare och praktiker inom yoga, meditation, ljudhealing, breathwork med mera.
 



 Vi söker nu en engagerad 
 **Digital Marketing & Growth Intern** 
  som kan hjälpa oss att bygga vårt varumärke, vår community och vår användarbas.
 



  





  





 🌿 Om oss
 



 Soulcircus är den senaste plattformen utvecklad av Dream Troopers AB - Cruncho Events / Soulcircus (grundat i Stockholm 2015). Vår systerplattform Cruncho Events används av städer som Toronto, Vancouver och Lund för att hantera evenemang. Med Soulcircus fokuserar vi på wellness – och bygger en tech-driven marknadsplats för lärare, healers och medvetna varumärken.
 



  





  





 💼 Din roll
 



 Du kommer hjälpa till att expandera Soulcircus genom att:
 


* Planera och genomföra digitala kampanjer på Instagram, Facebook, LinkedIn, TikTok m.fl.
* Skapa engagerande innehåll (inlägg, nyhetsbrev, visuals)
* Bygga vårt community och interagera med användare och lärare
* Sköta och optimera betald annonsering (Meta, LinkedIn, TikTok)
* Använda HubSpot för kontakter, leads och CRM
* Delta i strategiarbete och utforska nya marknader



  





  





 🙌 Du är
 


* Passionerad för wellness, spiritualitet och personlig utveckling
* Stark kommunikativ (svenska + engelska) med en kreativ ådra
* Van vid digitala verktyg som Canva, Mailchimp, HubSpot, Figma
* Nyfiken, driven och redo att lära i en snabb startup-miljö
* Studerande eller nyutexaminerad inom marknadsföring, business eller liknande



  





  





 🌟 Vad du får
 


* Chans att påverka en snabbt växande wellnessplattform
* Ett välkomnande team (du jobbar direkt med VD och kärnteamet)
* Tillgång till vårt privata 80m2-kontor i Stockholm med yogastudio, frukost & AW
* Flexibla arbetstider och möjlighet till distans
* Potential till fast anställning efter praktiken



  





 🗓 
 **Start** 
 : Juni 2025
 



 📆 
 **Längd** 
 : 5–6 månader (kan förlängas)
 



 💸 
 **Lön** 
 : Ja
 



 📍 
 **Plats** 
 : Bromma, Stockholm (hybrid möjlig)
 



  





  





 Ansök nu!
 



 Ansök här på Linkedin eller skicka CV + kort presentation till hello@soulcircus.io och berätta varför du vill jobba med oss. Vi rekryterar löpande så vänta inte för länge!
 



 Läs mer på soulcircus.se.
 



  





  





 \_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_
 



  





**Experience sharing from our colleagues:** 




  





 “
 *The amazing thing about working at Cruncho - Soulcircus is that your ideas really, truly matter. To be involved for the entire development process requires a large serving of personal responsibility and excellent communication skills - but the payoff is huge. Cruncho - Soulcircus is exciting, empowering and provides an endless catalyst for personal development, all while being surrounded by a diverse team of brilliant, kind and fun individuals.* 
 ” 
 



**Tobias** 
 , UX- and Frontend Engineer
 



  
 



*" Cruncho - Soulcircus is a very creative and open-minded workplace where, since day one, I have always been encouraged to take on projects and tasks that interest me and allow me to develop my abilities further. My Ideas are valued and my actions have a direct impact on the organisation, which is fascinating and motivating to see. I am very grateful to have had the opportunity to work with and be surrounded by incredibly inspiring people, from whom I’ve learned many new skills and perspectives. Finding a workplace like Cruncho - Soulcircus, where you can be yourself, meet people from all around the world, and have a major part in decision-making, is truly unique."* 




  





**Josefine** 
 , Business Developer Intern
 



  





*“Cruncho - Soulcircus is a place where you can put your ambitions and ideas into practice. I’m continuously developing my technical skills as well as how to better integrate my work with UX and business goals. I truly feel that the only limit to my growth is myself. Cruncho - Soulcircus is a creative and progressive environment that nurtures talent.”* 




  
 



**Anders** 
 , Backend Developer and Data Scientist 
 



  





*"When you are part of Cruncho - Soulcircus, you are part of a team that consistently works together to produce the best work possible, while also ensuring each individual has the opportunity to grow and learn. The people at Cruncho - Soulcircus trust each other inherently to reach the greatest solutions possible, and every idea is truly listened to and heard. This team is full of positivity and ambition, so if you want to grow in the best environment possible, Cruncho - Soulcircus is the place for you!"* 




  





**Romain** 
 , Full Stack Developer
 



  





*“Working at Cruncho - Soulcircus feels like being a part of something very unique. I like to reach out to the different customer segments, create and test innovative sales and marketing-related strategies that give results. I also enjoy working closely with our tech team and learning more about how data-driven solutions can revolutionise the way users get recommendations. Finally, I love the positive energy there is in the team, it makes my day, every day!”* 




**Andrea** 
 , Business Developer Intern 
 



  
 








*“It is both challenging and exciting to work at Cruncho - Soulcircus. I feel like I am travelling around the world everyday while sharing our innovative products. Every decision I take has a direct influence on the company’s future developments. I am so happy to be a part of this talented team and fast-growing journey.”* 




  





**Jenny** 
 , Business Development Manager 
 



  





**Welcome to Soulcircus!**

title: Shopify Page Builder (Freelancer)
description:
Beyond Alpha is a fast-growing natural food tech business selling across the United States, Australia and Europe. We specialize in formulating, producing and marketing gut, digestive and microbiome health foods and natural supplements, designed to help our clients make long-lasting positive health changes and start living very full lives again.
   

  

 We’re on the lookout for a Freelance Page Builder (Part-Time) to join our team on a project basis—with the potential for ongoing collaboration. Your first project will be to build a high-converting, visually engaging Product Page using GemPages for Beyond Alpha. This page should reflect the brand’s unique identity while also being optimized for performance and user experience.
   

  

 If we’re happy with the results and working together feels like a great fit, we’d love to continue working with you on a part-time freelance basis, helping us create similar product and landing pages. This is a great opportunity for someone who enjoys combining creative flair with conversion-focused design and is comfortable working in a flexible, remote setting.
   

  

 Why You'll Love Working at Beyond Alpha:
   

  

* Competitive Salary – Your skills and expertise deserve to be rewarded
* Work from Anywhere – Your home, a cozy café, or a beachside co-working space—it’s your call!
* Join a Supportive, Global Team – Work with passionate professionals from around the world
* Flexible Working Hours – Manage your schedule in a way that works best for you
* Exciting & Dynamic Work Environment – Every day brings new challenges and opportunities
* Make a Real Impact – Help create products that improve people’s lives


 Before you dive deeper, please note the following key points:
   

  

 📍This is a freelance fully remote part-time role
   

  

 📍We are seeking someone preferably with a background in B2C marketing
   

  

 📍Although the role is remote, the candidate must be available during EU hours (GMT)
   

  

 Key Responsibilities:
   

  

* Design and build a visually appealing, high-converting product page for Beyond Alpha using GemPages
* Ensure the page is fully responsive across all devices, including desktop, laptop, tablet, and mobile
* Maintain design consistency by closely following the provided Figma file, including correct spacing, typography, and image alignment
* Properly integrate dynamic elements tailored to each region, ensuring accurate functionality and localization
* Stay up to date with eCommerce page-building best practices and suggest improvements when appropriate


 Qualifications:
   

  

* Proven experience in building responsive product pages using GemPages (experience with Shopify is a plus)
* Strong understanding of UI/UX design principles, with a focus on creating engaging, conversion-optimized pages
* Experience working with D2C eCommerce brands, understanding the nuances of creating product pages that drive conversions and align with brand identity
* Proficiency in Figma for design handoff, ensuring accurate implementation of layouts and visual elements


 CVs must be in English
   

  

 Powered by JazzHR
